title: 4 BHK Independent Builder Floor in Sector 21C, Faridabad
description:
Brand new ultra luxury builder floor. If you are looking for an elegant residence in faridabad we have the wide range of options. Brand new ultra-Luxury builder floor ready to move/under construction/ booking size 180 sq yd to 600 sq yd at very prime location in all huda sectors of faridabad. The luxury interior designs will leave you amazed. Every room has spacious and airy, with the large windows enabling to enjoy sufficient natural light and beautiful views. The apartments offer a great deal of luxury and comfort that homebuyers crave for. These houses are a cost-Effective and spacious investment that makes this idea come to life. With their impressive designs and intelligent structure, they create a great & grand ambiance for its resident to experience. A good neighbourhood with several schools and also some reliable healthcare amenities from the reputed hospitals. Shopping hubs, cinema halls, restaurants, parks, banks, etc are available in plenty as well.

The builder floors are included with:-
1. Branded elevators
2. Modular kitchen
3. Chimney
4. Hob
5. Ceiling fans
6. Exhaust fans
7. Fully loaded bathrooms with jaquar or equivalent fittings
8. Interior works such as lcd panels, wall papers etc.
9. High end wardrobes
10. Dressing tables
